price: Kapag sinabi sa kanila: “Yumukod kayo,” hindi sila yumuyukod.
arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرۡكَعُواْ لَا يَرۡكَعُونَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā qīla lahumu ir'kaʿū lā yarkaʿūna
